original_text: Because I will cut off from you both righteous and wicked, therefore my sword shall be drawn from its sheath against all flesh from south to north.
korean_text: 내가 의인과 악인을 네게서 끊을 터이므로 내 칼을 칼집에서 빼어 모든 육체를 남에서 북까지 치리니

sentences.original_text: Because I will cut off from you both righteous and wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게서 의인과 악인을 끊어버리기 때문에

sentences.original_text: therefore my sword shall be drawn from its sheath
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내 칼이 칼집에서 뽑힐 것이라
